mapper.select: SELECT fap.product_name, fap.product_regdate , fap.farm_address, Date(upsh.sharing_date) AS sharing_date, upsh.user_bank, upsh.user_account, (ah.user_price* upsh.user_profit) AS deposit FROM user_profit_sharing_history AS upsh JOIN farm_and_product fap ON upsh.product_serial_num = fap.product_serial_num left outer JOIN auction_history ah ON upsh.product_serial_num = ah.product_serial_num WHERE upsh.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} AND ah.auction_status = 'O' ORDER BY upsh.sharing_date;

SELECT fap.product_name, fap.farm_name, ph.amount, ph.history_content, Date(ph.update_date) AS update_date, DATE_FORMAT(ph.update_date, '%H:%i') AS update_time FROM point_history ph LEFT OUTER JOIN farm_and_product fap ON ph.product_serial_num = fap.product_serial_num WHERE ph.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} ORDER BY ph.update_date

SELECT fap.product_name, fap.farm_name, ph.amount, ph.history_content, DATE(ph.update_date) AS update_date, DATE_FORMAT(ph.update_date, '%H:%i') AS update_time FROM point_history ph LEFT OUTER JOIN farm_and_product fap ON ph.product_serial_num = fap.product_serial_num WHERE ph.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} AND DATE(ph.update_date) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY ph.update_date

SELECT fap.product_name, fap.product_regdate , fap.farm_address, Date(fpsh.sharing_date) AS sharing_date, fpsh.farmer_bank, fpsh.farmer_account, (ah.user_price* fpsh.farmer_profit) AS deposit FROM farmer_profit_sharing_history AS fpsh JOIN farm_and_product fap ON fpsh.product_serial_num = fap.product_serial_num JOIN auction_history ah ON ah.product_serial_num = fpsh.product_serial_num WHERE fpsh.farmer_serial_num = #{farmer_serial_num} AND ah.auction_status = 'O' ORDER BY fpsh.sharing_date;
